oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Appalachian Exposition, Knoxville, Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: View of the Appalachian Exposition, September 12th to October 12th, 1910, Knoxville, Tennessee. Shows the expanse of the exposition, including buildings, land, and people.
This was the first large exposition held in the southern Appalachian region. The intention of the exposition was to demonstrate progress in southern industry and commerce.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Chas. C. Cullen and Co., Inc.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Exhibitions; People; Rivers
